Today I joined @SenatorLeahy and @SenBooker in demanding that all senators on the Judiciary committee get tested for COVID-19 ahead of the Supreme Court hearings.

This is the bare minimum to ensure the safety of members, our staff, and the Senate complex employees.

If you:
Have a preexisting condition
Love someone with a preexisting condition

Know that protections for anyone with a preexisting condition are on the line if Mitch McConnell and Senate Republicans confirm another Supreme Court Justice.

Instead of taking up additional COVID-19 relief legislation that our country so desperately needs, the Senate on Monday is holding Supreme Court confirmation hearings. This is entirely out of touch with what the American people are demanding.

We made a promise to students: go to college, get a degree, and get ahead. Student debt has broken that promise for too many Black Americans. The federal government can easily help close the racial wealth gap immediately if we #CancelStudentDebt. https://www.marketwatch.com/story/student-debt-is-fueling-the-black-white-wealth-gap-and-pursuing-a-college-degree-has-become-racialized-this-professor-says-11599861959

The 2008 crisis was a gut-punch to the financial lives of young people. Most never recovered. Now we seriously risk making the same mistakes during this crisis. If we #CancelStudentDebt, it will help prevent irreversible wealth loss in young Americans. https://newrepublic.com/article/159420/student-debt-forgiveness-coronavirus-warren-schumer

Huge numbers of Americans agree: instead of forcing student borrowers to keep signing over their paychecks the federal govt, we should #CancelStudentDebt and boost our economy by putting those monthly payments back into communities and small businesses. https://www.forbes.com/sites/adamminsky/2020/09/25/new-poll-shows-substantial-bipartisan-support-for-student-loan-forgiveness-and-other-relief-for-borrowers/#72c13d3c2b7c

The federal govt shares responsibility for our student debt crisis. Anyone whose family couldn’t write a check for college got loaded up with debt AND charged high interest. But here’s the good news: we can solve this problem if we #CancelStudentDebt. https://finance.yahoo.com/news/student-loans-in-america-are-a-federal-government-problem-expert-explains-141745084.html

Too many Americans are struggling to find jobs and keep a roof over their heads during this pandemic. And student loans are a 1.5-trillion-pound weight on too many of their shoulders.

@SenSchumer and I agree: The next President can and should #CancelStudentDebt. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1314631033527169027/img/Wg8Am93oSYrzGnra.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1314631033527169027/vid/486x270/apfD7OUZSApMzrMV.mp4?tag=13
